definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 经商标局核准后，发给注册人相应证明，并予以公告。

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企业法人应当在核准登记的经营范围内从事经营。

sentences.english: Any other vehicle on which exemption is granted on the approval of the Provincial TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 经省交通征费稽查机构核准免征的其他机动车。

sentences.english: Date and reference number of the FSC approval or effective registration of offering and sale;
sentences.chinese: 经本会核准或申报生效募集及销售之日期及文号。

sentences.english: Any renewal of registration shall be published after it has been approved.
sentences.chinese: 续展注册经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: After the assignment of a registered trademark has been approved, it shall be publicly announced.
sentences.chinese: 转让注册商标经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: Some states had been approved for emergency federal aid.
sentences.chinese: 有些州已经经核准得到联邦援助。

sentences.english: Second, the Supreme Court should improve the judicial process of the final decision right to death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 其次，建议最高人民法院收回死刑核准权。

sentences.english: Without any examination and approval according to law, no entity or individual may make a public issuance of any securities.
sentences.chinese: 未经依法核准，任何单位和个人不得公开发行证券。

sentences.english: Approve of qualification of ministry of classics country construction plans to design an unit for first class.
sentences.chinese: 经国家建设部资格核准为甲级规划设计单位。

sentences.english: Does the investment scale need approval from the Central or local government?
sentences.chinese: 投资规模是否需要中国中央政府或地方政府核准？

sentences.english: Measures for charging arbitration fees shall be submitted to the price control authorities for examination and approval.
sentences.chinese: 收取仲裁费用的办法，应当报物价管理部门核准。

sentences.english: To conduct other relevant businesses which may be authorized by the Central Competent Authority.
sentences.chinese: 二二经中央主管机关核准办理之其他有关业务。

sentences.english: Any renewa1 of registration shall be published after it as been approved.
sentences.chinese: 续展注册经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: The assignment of registered trademark shall be announced upon its approva1.
sentences.chinese: 转让注册商标经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: After renewal of registration is approved, it shall be announced.
sentences.chinese: 续展注册经核准后，予以公告。

definition: to reply officially to a subordinate
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
official written ruling in response to a submission/official approval in writing
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
